com.quorum.tessera.enclave

Interface PayloadEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PayloadEncoderImpl

    public interface PayloadEncoder
    Encodes and decodes a EncodedPayload to and from its binary representation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PayloadEncoder create() 
      EncodedPayload decode(byte[] input)
      Decodes a byte array back into an encrypted payload
      byte[] encode(EncodedPayload payload)
      Encodes the payload to a byte array
      EncodedPayload forRecipient(EncodedPayload input, PublicKey recipient)
      Strips a payload of any data that isn't relevant to the given recipient Used to format a payload before it is sent to the target node

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        byte[] encode(EncodedPayload payload)
        Encodes the payload to a byte array
        Parameters:
        payload - the payload to encode
        Returns:
        the byte array representing the encoded payload

      • decode

        EncodedPayload decode(byte[] input)
        Decodes a byte array back into an encrypted payload
        Parameters:
        input - The byte array to decode into an EncodedPayload
        Returns:
        the decoded payload

      • forRecipient

        EncodedPayload forRecipient(EncodedPayload input,
                            PublicKey recipient)
        Strips a payload of any data that isn't relevant to the given recipient Used to format a payload before it is sent to the target node
        Parameters:
        input - the full payload from which data needs to be stripped
        recipient - the recipient to retain information about
        Returns:
        a payload which contains a subset of data from the input, which is relevant to the recipient

      • create

        static PayloadEncoder create()
